fr.n7.stl.ast

Interface ExpressionFactory

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlockFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockFactoryImpl

    public interface ExpressionFactory
    Factory to create Abstract Syntax Tree nodes for common expressions in programming languages.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • createBinaryExpression

        Expression createBinaryExpression(Expression _left,
                                  BinaryOperator _operator,
                                  Expression _right)
        Parameters:
        _left - Abstract Syntax Tree for the left parameter of the binary operation.
        _operator - Enum value for the binary operator.
        _right - Abstract Syntax Tree for the right parameter of the binary operation.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the binary operation.

      • createUnaryExpression

        Expression createUnaryExpression(UnaryOperator _operator,
                                 Expression _parameter)
        Parameters:
        _operator - Enum value for the unary operator.
        _parameter - Abstract Syntax Tree for the parameter of the unary operation.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the unary operation.

      • createIntegerValue

        Value createIntegerValue(java.lang.String _texte)
        Parameters:
        _texte - Textual representation of the value of the Abstract Syntax Tree IntegerValue node.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the integer constant.

      • createBooleanValue

        Value createBooleanValue(boolean _value)
        Parameters:
        _value - Boolean value for the Abstract Syntax Tree BooleanValue node.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the boolean constant.

      • createVariableUse

        Expression createVariableUse(java.lang.String _name)
        Parameters:
        _name - Name of the accessed variable.
        Returns:
        Abstract Syntax Tree node for the access to a variable.

        Expression createCouple(Expression _left,
                        Expression _right)
